long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your review and approval process for interactive content, including websites, interactive PDFs, and any browser-based material.
Add comments and annotate interactive proofs—all without having to download a desktop application. Simply install the plugin, and get to work.
